p: At the beginning and the end of the treatment, the insulin tolerance test was performed to evaluate the insulin sensitivity. A dose of 0.15 IU/kg of semislow insulin was injected subcutaneously to diabetic rats prior to a 12 h nonhydrated fasting as described by Patarrão et al. [ 28] with slight modifications. The glycemia was measured after insulin injection ( t = 0 min) and then successively after 15, 30, and 60 min insulin injection. The slope of the linear decline in plasma glucose ( K ITT) was calculated according to the following formula: K ITT = (0.693/ T 1/2) × 100 [ 28, 29]. T 1/2 represents the half life of plasmatic glucose.
